name: Handi - 2D (PC)
description:
This is my first gaming project using the Unity engine and C#.  I'm still working on it, but I wanted to upload the current iteration to get help testing for bugs. 

The Story:

The story takes place after a post parasitic alien invasion. Alien parasites have taken over the Earth, but the parasites can only inhabit healthy host human bodies, which mean the sick and disabled are immune to the parasites. 

Enter our hero Handi.  Handi is a young engineer that used parts from an alien space ship he found, to enhance his wheelchair. Now he uses his new found enhancements to fight the aliens and to save mankind.
